home.title: Transforming Vision into Digital Reality with Code & Design
home.content: Full-Stack JavaScript Developer | React, Next, Redux-Toolkit, Node.js, Express, MongoDB Creating Engaging Web Experiences with HTML, CSS, and JS Passionate about Building Scalable Solutions and User-Centric Design.

meta.title: Home | My Portfolio
meta.description: Welcome to my portfolio homepage. Explore my skills, experience, and achievements in web development.

about.title: Passion ignites purpose
about.content: I am passionate about full-stack development with extensive experience across various projects. Currently, I am focused on developing the Pizza Hut Progressive Web App (PWA) for Gulf countries. Recently, I contributed to the KFC PWA, serving major markets such as the UAE, KSA, Egypt, and Jordan. My portfolio includes the US Medicine Premium web app (e-commerce platform), Accosis (Finance web), and experience at Earthlink.net.  As a full-stack developer, I prioritize problem-solving and user-centric experiences, utilizing technologies such as React, Next.js,Redux, Redux-toolkit, Context-Api, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Radix UI, Node.js, NestJS, MongoDB, and Stripe. My diverse work in the food industry, including projects like Food Haven, reflects my commitment to delivering high-quality applications.
about.content2: In my past experiences, I had the opportunity to work with Earthlink.net, the second-largest internet service provider in the USA, where I honed my skills and expertise. Additionally, my portfolio includes various projects related to the food industry, such as Food Haven and many more.
about.content3: As a full-stack developer, I focus on solving problems and crafting user-centric experiences, combining innovative solutions with robust architectures.

school.place: Govt. Senior secondary Modal School BASDEHRA (H.P.B.O.S.E)
school.info: I completed my 10+2 education with a non-medical focus, equipping me with a strong foundation in subjects such as mathematics, physics, and chemistry, which has greatly contributed to my analytical and problem-solving skills

college.info: Relevant courses included Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Systems Engineering, and Operating System, CAM etc.

graduation.place: Indira Gandhi Institute of Technology and Management
graduation.info: Relevant courses included Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Systems Engineering, and Artificial Intelligence and Microprocessor.

seniorDev.work: Since 2022, at Appinventiv, I have been working with Americana Food Organisation, a prominent client from UAE. My responsibilities have involved working on diverse projects for renowned brands such as KFC, Pizza Hut, Krispy Kreme, Hardee's, and Wimpy. This experience has allowed me to contribute to high-profile projects and strengthen my expertise in delivering top-notch solutions for the food industry.

developer.work: At Digimantra Labs, I worked as a full stack developer on USA-based client projects for Earthlink.net, gaining over two years of experience. I contributed to building and delivering web applications, honing my skills in front-end and back-end technologies, and focusing on scalable and user-centric solutions

fresher.work: At Innow8 apps, my fresher work experience revolved around projects utilizing Node.js, React, React Native, and AWS. It provided valuable insights into full-stack development and cloud-based solutions, fostering collaborative efforts to deliver efficient and user-centric applications
